name: svg-opti-detector
description: A powerful Node.js tool to analyze, optimize, and detect duplicate inline SVGs in HTML from URLs or local files. Provides detailed optimization reports with color-coded output and potential file size savings.
features: Analyze inline SVGs from URLs or local HTML files
Calculate original vs optimized file sizes using SVGO
Color-coded optimization status (red=needs optimization, yellow=moderate, green=good)
Optional duplicate SVG detection with class name reporting
Support for SVG identification via class, id, width, height, and viewBox attributes
Clean, formatted console output with emojis and progress indicators
Compatible with Node.js 16+ and native fetch API
